name: Zetafone LT-600 Simulator
description:
This is a simulator for the Zetafone LT-600, released early to celebrate my YouTube channel JSR Phones reaching 700 subscribers. Please note however that not everything works at the moment. Here's what does:

  • Most of everything in the Menu works, with the exception of Language and some options in Security
  • The phone book, calculator, about and my number menus work
  • The phone's battery works, and you can press P to plug it into the mains
  • Authentic screen blur effect
  • Virtual keypad

Thanks for supporting me this far! And here's to this project's future!
